snippet: A Vietnamese court on Monday sentenced 22 members of an outlawed group to lengthy prison terms for trying to overthrow the government.
abstract: Vietnamese court sentences 22 members of outlawed group to lengthy prison terms for trying to overthrow government.
lead_paragraph: A Vietnamese court on Monday sentenced 22 members of an outlawed group to lengthy prison terms for trying to overthrow the government.
